taskDescription: Access ALFRED from workstations to review patient data

Demand rapid, unfiltered access to patient vital signs
Override patient privacy settings when needed for clinical focus
Acknowledge value of social features but remain cautious
Feels concerned about the increasing challenge given the user’s mobility issues
Wants to impose easier game levels or restrict certain physical activities
Feels frustrated when system notifications flood the screen after work
Plans to discuss care adjustments with the informal caregiver

Review activity logs and nutrition data collected by ALFRED
Use minimal, consented monitoring data without alerting Olivia
Respect Olivia’s refusal to engage in challenging exercise routines
Wish for more rigorous exercise enforcement while honoring patient’s wishes

Reviews patient profiles and sensor data sharing settings

Prepares and conducts scheduled video check-ins with patients like Olivia
Respects patient requests for location-specific video calls only at home
Suggests more intensive exercises or sensor use despite patient refusal

Prioritizes patient safety but acknowledges privacy barriers in ALFRED
